title: Is content in the public domain legal to download for free and also legal to sell? - Quora
tags: Legal Issues and Law in Everyday Life

response.answer_text: Yes, content in the public domain is legal to download for free and also legal to sell. You can modify it however you want. You can use it in whatever projects you want. You can do anything you want with it that you can normally do with your own property. You can even re-license your copy to any license, including a commercial license.
